text: Kamaghɨn amizɨ, nɨ datɨrɨghɨn uan arazir mɨzɨrɨzibar aghumsɨzim iniam. Kɨ ian gara bar ian araziba tuisɨgha ghaze, nɨn arazir kuraba bar ikuvizɨ kɨ bar dar aghua. Ezɨ amizir igharazimning, nan damazimɨn amizir aghuimningɨn mɨn oto. Bizir kam bangɨn, nɨ datɨrɨghɨn uan aghumsɨzir ekiam iniva navim bar ikuvigham.”
